scripts.dev: export ENV="dev" || set ENV="dev"; [ -z "${SS_KEY}"  ] && echo "WARN: SS_KEY not set. Defaulting to ''" && export SS_KEY="" || set SS_KEY=""; [ -z "${PQAI_KEY}"  ] && echo "WARN: PQAI_KEY not set. Defaulting to ''" && export PQAI_KEY="" || set PQAI_KEY=""; [ -z "${TAV_KEY}" ] && echo "WARN: TAV_KEY not set. Defaulting to ''" && export TAV_KEY="" || set TAV_KEY=""; rollup -c -w --bundleConfigAsCjs
